scenes.background: Monica and Bob are discussing the urgency of finalizing the project.
scenes.description: I really think we need to have a detailed discussion to avoid any issues later.

options.text: Perhaps we can handle this over a detailed email thread instead.
options.analysis: You suggested an alternative to another meeting, showing good emotional perception and maintaining self-regulation, but empathy could be improved.

options.text: I understand the concern. Let's schedule a brief call tomorrow to finalize things.
options.analysis: You agreed to a brief call, showing empathy and motivation, but self-regulation was slightly compromised.

options.text: If it's that urgent, we should prioritize it now and wrap it up quickly.
options.analysis: You showed initiative to address the urgency immediately, demonstrating good emotional perception, but social skills could be better.
